[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/node-core-library](./node-core-library.md) &gt; [FileSystem](./node-core-library.filesystem.md) &gt; [changePosixModeBits](./node-core-library.filesystem.changeposixmodebits.md)

## FileSystem.changePosixModeBits() method

Changes the permissions (i.e. file mode bits) for a filesystem object. Behind the scenes it uses `fs.chmodSync()`<></>.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static changePosixModeBits(path: string, modeBits: PosixModeBits): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

path


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The absolute or relative path to the object that should be updated.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

modeBits


</td><td>

[PosixModeBits](./node-core-library.posixmodebits.md)


</td><td>

POSIX-style file mode bits specified using the [PosixModeBits](./node-core-library.posixmodebits.md) enum


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
